title: noormcs5
author: noormcs5
content: I take part in lotteries but I usually do not make a lot of hope to win a lottery. Participating n the lottery is the easiest thing but getting a win out of it may be the most difficult thing. By the way, its fun participating in online lotteries.Of course, if you take part in a lottery, you would track its progress and the result. Although i do not think that i am too lucky to win a lottery but still I keep looking for the results and see if any day i would win something big. What if, I get a chance to participate in a lottery without any investment? If any gambling site offers, free of cost entry in the lottery, i would definitely not miss that one.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on April 16, 2023, 10:33:58 PMWhat if, I get a chance to participate in a lottery without any investment? If any gambling site offers, free of cost entry in the lottery, i would definitely not miss that one. For a giveaway, yes, but don't expect its common coz its not. Check games and rounds boards for that. About free lottery in gambling casino? It's not common that you can entry without betting money, maybe a they give you a bonus but you need to deposit first so its not free.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: The chance of winning in a lottery oftentimes is one in many millions, though I do take part in gambling lotteries but, I don't often participate.  The time I participated on lotteries when there is a promotion being held in a casino or when my wagering activity is automatically counted and earned me a ticket for a lottery.Quote from: noormcs5 on April 16, 2023, 10:33:58 PMWhat if, I get a chance to participate in a lottery without any investment? I think there is an active lottery event hosted by Utopia p2p ecosystem.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5448768.0Quote from: noormcs5 on April 16, 2023, 10:33:58 PMIf any gambling site offers, free of cost entry in the lottery, i would definitely not miss that one. Everyone loves free entry for a possible huge prize.  So I dare not miss this kind of lottery too.

comments.author: n0ne
comments.body: When it is free entry, then everyone will try their luck through these lottery games. These lottery have made big changes in the winners life. With sports betting and other gambling activities it is quite hard to make such big wins.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on April 16, 2023, 10:33:58 PMI take part in lotteries but I usually do not make a lot of hope to win a lottery. Participating n the lottery is the easiest thing but getting a win out of it may be the most difficult thing. By the way, its fun participating in online lotteries.You said it right that most of us have a slim chance to win in a lottery but regardless of that, many still get those tickets and tries their luck with it. Yeah, it's fun but it's like the result of it had already been decided for the majority not to win.Quote from: noormcs5 on April 16, 2023, 10:33:58 PMOf course, if you take part in a lottery, you would track its progress and the result. Although i do not think that i am too lucky to win a lottery but still I keep looking for the results and see if any day i would win something big. What if, I get a chance to participate in a lottery without any investment? If any gambling site offers, free of cost entry in the lottery, i would definitely not miss that one. That's also one of the fun part, you get to have fun getting those free lottery tickets from giveaways and there's that essence of having it freely and you're not going to worry whether you win or not, as long as you've taken that for free.Anyway, I don't usually get into lotteries and I know that it's fun but I'm done with that part so I'd just say good luck to you as you track your progress with it.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Every casino has giveaways for you to participate in a lottery game. This is the kind of lottery I believe where you pick patterns and many of us can win which is against the house as well.There is another lottery game that I don't join especially the lottery where participants contribute to the pot and only one will be the winner. Its a big win though.

comments.author: Fundamentals Of
comments.body: I also take part in lotteries. Just like you, I don't hope much when it comes to lotteries. Even in free raffles when the participants are only up to 100, I don't expect to win. Depending on the kind of lottery, the number combinations could reach in the millions and tens of millions. If you only bought 1 to 3 combinations, your chance of winning is lower than 0.00001%. So there's no point expecting to win. There are so many people who have been betting on lotteries and have already died without winning. Why would a betting site offer free lottery tickets?

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Plenty in games and rounds. Some on gambling platforms themselves. One time I was close to hitting jackpot on one of casinos by one number. I tried to chase jackpot after that, turned out futile, never again. Would happily take free entries tho.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on April 16, 2023, 10:33:58 PMWhat if, I get a chance to participate in a lottery without any investment? If any gambling site offers, free of cost entry in the lottery, i would definitely not miss that one. Casinos do not offer free lunch you have to qualify yourself on the casino requirement like wagering requirements or you need to be at a certain level to have the privilege to be in a lottery, many casinos offer lottery and free spins to their players from time to time.I'm not a big fan of lotteries we have a lot of lottery-based casinos here but they are not getting enough support maybe because of the odds or just maybe they like the offline lottery more than the online-based one.But if there's a casino that offers participation by just being a member of their casino I'll gladly take it.

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on April 17, 2023, 02:16:46 AMCasinos do not offer free lunch you have to qualify yourself on the casino requirement like wagering requirements or you need to be at a certain level to have the privilege to be in a lottery, many casinos offer lottery and free spins to their players from time to time.While that's true some free lotteries only have those requirements as a way to prevent abuse because there are always people who will cheat their way to win the prize.And from what I've seen the free lotteries tend to have a 1x wagering requirement only because they're in a form of free spins or free balance.Iirc bitcasino used to host free lotteries before changing their giveaway into a price prediction type which is still worth joining.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on April 16, 2023, 10:33:58 PMWhat if, I get a chance to participate in a lottery without any investment? If any gambling site offers, free of cost entry in the lottery, i would definitely not miss that one. one of the well-known casinos on this forum has it which is carried out regularly every week, it's just that the chance is very small to be able to win because the casino already has tens of millions of users and getting tickets to take part in the draw is very easy so almost all users have tickets to be drawn, yet again we will be competing with players with a very large number of tickets, but since it's free there should be no problem winning or not only sometimes expectations that don't come true can be quite upsetting.And I entered this lottery because I get free tickets every week and haven't made anything after years of participating in it.

comments.author: IIrik11
comments.created_time: April 17, 2023, 04:02:32 AMLast edit: April 17, 2023, 04:45:10 AM by IIrik11
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on April 16, 2023, 10:33:58 PMWhat if, I get a chance to participate in a lottery without any investment? If any gambling site offers, free of cost entry in the lottery, i would definitely not miss that one. click the link in my sig.and to answer ur question, i do participate in lotteries.crypto ones and local fiat ones every day.and i have realized the key to winning is to be consistent.gl

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on April 16, 2023, 10:33:58 PMI take part in lotteries but I usually do not make a lot of hope to win a lottery. Participating n the lottery is the easiest thing but getting a win out of it may be the most difficult thing. By the way, its fun participating in online lotteries.Of course, if you take part in a lottery, you would track its progress and the result. Although i do not think that i am too lucky to win a lottery but still I keep looking for the results and see if any day i would win something big. What if, I get a chance to participate in a lottery without any investment? If any gambling site offers, free of cost entry in the lottery, i would definitely not miss that one. I've had my fair share of lotteries, haven't experienced winning in one so far though. I've won some minor prizes but no grand prize win yet. Not really hoping to get a win most of the time, entries just so happen to coincide with me seeing them and me having spare money, so why not. I'd have better chances hoping for some wins in the casino rather than hoping for a win in lotteries.As for a lottery without paying, I think those are called sweepstakes iirc? It's a legit system and who knows, there may actually be some in your casino of choice.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on April 16, 2023, 10:33:58 PMOf course, if you take part in a lottery, you would track its progress and the result. In my case this is not the case. Lately I play online and if I win a prize I am notified by email and SMS to my mobile phone, so I don't even look at the results anymore.Quote from: noormcs5 on April 16, 2023, 10:33:58 PMWhat if, I get a chance to participate in a lottery without any investment? If any gambling site offers, free of cost entry in the lottery, i would definitely not miss that one. Apart from Utopia, playing the free game on freebitco.in also gives you lottery tickets, and, although the probability is low, there have been cases of people with few tickets winning. The first prize is usually around 0.1 bitcoin, and there are up to 10 winners.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: They do giveaways, perhaps you should subscribe to them so that you will be notified when it will happen. That's the only "free" part that you will receive but other than that, you must pay for entry. That's where they will get the funds for the prizes for all the winners so it's just fair. Before I also took part in lotteries at freebitco.in, some I received the tickets for free, and some I bought with my faucet earnings but that was a long time ago. I don't know now if they still do that kind of event, you could check it out, they are one of the known longest signature campaigns here in the forum.The faucet part though may not be existing anymore.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: most people on this forum probably know where they can buy or play the lottery online with bitcoin prizes, I personally used to play the lottery on the freebitcoin site where the winner is announced every week and it's really free just do some kind of free spin game every hour get bitcoin free also got a free lottery ticket, but i have never won a lottery there, as you said don't expect to get a win in a lottery game because it is purely based on luck.I have never tried other lottery sites because I prefer to get it for free so I won't lose if I don't win it I can even buy lots of lottery tickets from the free money that I get on freebitcoin as an example below the prizes available for lottery winners usually every week 10 winners are announced lottery ticket

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on April 16, 2023, 10:33:58 PMI take part in lotteries but I usually do not make a lot of hope to win a lottery. Participating n the lottery is the easiest thing but getting a win out of it may be the most difficult thing. By the way, its fun participating in online lotteries.Of course, if you take part in a lottery, you would track its progress and the result. Although i do not think that i am too lucky to win a lottery but still I keep looking for the results and see if any day i would win something big. What if, I get a chance to participate in a lottery without any investment? If any gambling site offers, free of cost entry in the lottery, i would definitely not miss that one. I enter in lotteries where the participation fee is not big,for example I like the weekly lottery on TV that most countries have and that is drawn live every Sunday.The cost where I live for such a ticket is 2 dollars and is a 15 out of 90 one which is very difficult to win and the people who usually win it have a huge amount of luck favoring them.I also take part in free lotteries in gambling sites like the one Freebitco.in does every weekly also as the site gives you the option to get them free or even to buy many of them if you want for a really small cost.It is the same though,the difficulty to win such a lottery remains huge.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on April 16, 2023, 10:33:58 PMI take part in lotteries but I usually do not make a lot of hope to win a lottery. Participating n the lottery is the easiest thing but getting a win out of it may be the most difficult thing. By the way, its fun participating in online lotteries.You reduce your chances of winning by not being hopeful and positive that you can win it. To win a lottery is difficult, by why do you keep playing without being hopeful to win? People win lotteries, and at any moment, it could be your turn, you do not need to terminate it with too much doubts. Whenever you take part in lottery and then you do not win, rather than saying you are not lucky, console yourself with a better thought that it is not your turn to win.

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: You are looking for a unicorn .... something that does not exist and something that cannot exist. A lottery can only exist, if there are people buying tickets for it. Yes, Stake.com have a lottery... ehmmm, giveaway that give out tickets, but you have to wager $1000 for every one ticket that are issued. (So you are paying for those tickets, with the money that you are losing in the wagering)I play the Lottery every week.... and I have been doing this for years.. and the only money that I have won.. was a few dollars for 3 correct numbers. The chance to win the lottery are almost zero, if you only buy small amounts of lottery tickets.

comments.author: xSkylarx
comments.body: That is really part of when we take part in something, we just hope to win, but we don't expect that we will win because the chances are low. Also, I am checking it mostly when the results are out just to see if I won, but I am not fun of the lottery. I just sometimes feel like buying a ticket or trying to bet certain numbers as I feel lucky, but people I've known have been buying tickets and betting their numbers on a daily basis, and they are always excited when the results are out.
